definitions.definition: someone who admires and supports a person, sport, sports team, etc.:
examples: More than 15,000 Liverpool fans attended Saturday's game.

definitions.definition: to wave a fan, or something that acts as a fan, in front of your face:
examples: It was so hot in the car that I tried to fan myself with the road map.

definitions.definition: to blow air at a fire to make it burn more strongly
